titles.title: Marijuana Effective Drug Studies Act of 2016
MEDS Act
A bill to improve medical research on marijuana.
MEDS Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

term.name: Drug safety, medical device, and laboratory regulation

bill.summary:
Marijuana Effective Drug Studies Act of 2016 or the MEDS Act
This bill amends the Controlled Substances Act to:
establish, with respect to marijuana research, a new federal registration process that is separate from the process for research involving other schedule I drugs; establish a process for registering persons to manufacture or distribute marijuana for purposes of either research or the commercial production of certain approved drugs containing or derived from marijuana; and modify other requirements related to marijuana research and production.
